manager

Class SeedBagManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.SeedBagManager

  • public class SeedBagManager
extends java.lang.Object
    manages the Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete of Seedbags

                          Crop crop)
        Get a user's seedbag
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of the seedbag
        crop - the type of crop for the seedbag to retrieve
